question: Which botanical garden can be found in Kota Bogor, Indonesia?
asked_question_translated: Ktorú botanickú záhradu nájdete v meste Kota Bogor v Indonézii?
answer: V meste Kota Bogor v Indonézii nájdete botanickú záhradu Kebun Raya Bogor.
answer_translated_eng: In Kota Bogor, Indonesia, you will find the Kebun Raya Bogor Botanical Garden.
